characterDescription:
Godeke was an Edgedancer, so his bonded spren was a cultivationspren. Her name is Archinal.
Previously, he was an ardent.
Godeke used the last of his Stormlight to make food.

characterDetails.Appearance: He had a squared beard, a reminder of his ardent past.
characterDetails.Notes: The character Godeke is named for a longtime fan known by many, including Brandon and Peter. He is very much missed within our community.
